channel.title: Areithe MMORPG SCREENSHOTS!
channel.description:
As most of you know I've been working on G.A.S.P.© Inc.'s new MMORPG, Ariethe. Well, we finnally have some screenshots, and would have a Beta or Alpha out but the production was deleyed to a computer crash, and us not getting the right models. But anyways enough chit-chat. Here are the screenies. (also, for the link to the forum, look in my signature).
Screenshot 1:[url=http://img293.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scryny1vr7.png]http://img293.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scryny1vr7.png[/url] Screenshot 2:[url=http://img291.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scryny2pz9.png]http://img291.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scryny2pz9.png[/url] Screenshot 3:[url=http://img60.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scryny3my9.png]http://img60.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scryny3my9.png[/url]

item.title: Areithe MMORPG SCREENSHOTS!
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

for the first part, arent you arleady registered though, if your active you can test it maybe :p[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 11:00:00 PM[/size][hr]Also if anyone has any free character models, links would be appreciated. In .b3d format though :p…or .3DS…or .MAX

item.title: Areithe MMORPG SCREENSHOTS!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I already gave some pointers on your forums, but might as well say some more crits here since I’m too lazy to log into your forums atm

-Use less distance fog.
-Try using some different textures, because you’ll get flamed on every other game forum for using rc’s default texture. Hell, all I did was rip rc textures and people flamed me non stop.
-Try adding in some tree’s
-Take a picture from the players point of view, rather then being so high up

Other then that, not a bad start.

Read full topic
